e="preserve">Ravi Belagere (15 March 1958 – 13 November 2020) was an Indian writer and journalist. He was born in Ballari, Karnataka. He was the editor of Kannada language tabloid "Hai Bangalore" and the magazine "O Manase".
Belagere died on 13 November 2020 in Bangalore from a heart attack, aged 62.
